Talk_20:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>It was all my fault, sweetheart. <sp:5:1:0>Can't we live together
again? Please?<sp:5:1:0>

No, that's not right...<sp:5:1:0> You're the only one for me,
my love. I was an idiot, like always... <sp:5:1:0>Ooo,
I think she'll like that better.
*sigh* I had no idea it would be this hard to
face her...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This is my home. Or rather...it used to be.


It was partially destroyed by the falling
ruins. I said I didn't care what they did
with it after that and set off on a journey.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Big mistake. I thought they would just
remove the rubble. I didn't think they'd
go and build a research facility here...
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Sorry you had to see me like that.


<sp:3:0:2:0000>I was just a little shocked to see my
home...er, transformed like that.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>But if my home is useful as a place of
research for my village, I'm thrilled!
I, Cado, am happy to donate my house!
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Argh... My poor house... My poor, poor...<sp:5:1:0>
Hm?
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, it's just that my house was turned
into a research facility while I was away
on my journey.
But if my home is useful to the village like
this, I'm thrilled! I welcome the change!
I, Cado, am happy to donate my house!
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Ah, if it isn't Sir Link! What's on
your mind?

As for me, I just came by to check on my
precious Cuccos!

I never imagined that my house would be
turned into a research facility while I was
traveling. Life is full of surprises!
It's a tough reality to accept... <sp:5:1:0>Luckily,
I've managed to accept it easily, so don't
you worry about Cado!
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I trained my precious Cuccos to protect
the village from the Yiga Clan while I
was away...
But I fear I may have been too strict with
their training.

Ever since I've returned, none of them
will come and see me...
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>If it isn't Sir Link! Out for a stroll, are we?


Who, me? I'm...um...well... Ah, yes!
The Cuccos!

I was just doing the rounds, making sure
my precious Cuccos are doing well!

<sp:3:0:2:0700>I trained them to protect the village from
the Yiga Clan while I was away...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But I fear I may have been too strict with
their training.

Ever since I've returned, none of them
will come and see me...
